nf:module.nf:name: bitrate_ewma
nf:module.nf:description: Registers for Bitrate computation with Ewma

nf:register.nf:name: alpha
nf:register.nf:description: Input register contains alpha parameter for ewma behaviour (7 possible values [0-7]. 0 is default)

nf:register.nf:name: ewma
nf:register.nf:description: Output register contains total bitrate with ewma
